title: New: Spirits Of Leo – Ghost Story
content:
Having been hard at work since the release of his debut EP simply titled I, Spirits Of Leo aka Ryan Santos Phillips is back with the first track taken from his debut album.

More industrial sounding than the dream-pop of his first outing, Ghost Story draws from the rougher shogaze elements, more Ride than Slowdive or Pale Saints. ‘I don’t wanna lie / thoughts make me terrified / scared to be asleep / far too numb to shut my eyes’, it’s the documentation of inner turmoil and restless belonging. Check it out below, taken from the forthcoming Spirits of Leo debut album Anastasia.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
